ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????
ygData.msgSnippet: [Steven R. Hulse] I just found it extremely annoying. I was mostly just working on leveling and the money aspect wasn t of too much concern but what about all
ygData.messageBody:
[Steven R. Hulse] I just found it extremely annoying. I was mostly just
working on leveling and the money aspect wasn't of too much concern but
what about all the newbies. Man that would really tick me off if I was
new and trying to earn some cash and some ass comes up and steals my
loot.
[Steven R. Hulse] For example, the other night I was with a group at Orc
Hill and accidently stole another player's kill. (Carnage everywhere,
got confused), My whole intention was to help her out since she was a
lower lvl character and getting her butt kicked by 3 Orcs Luckily she
shouted out and I realized what happened and made it up to her. I
wouldn't mind the stealing if it was accidental and then they realized
and apologized, heck I probably would ask them to team up, All I want to
do now is lvl my characters. But blatently follow and steal is just
annoying. I've noticed that a few newbies are the main ones. Yes I can
understand if youÂ’re a Gnome and go over to Greater Fey to lvl at Orc
hill or to buy stuff and don't want to get killed but hey there are
those of us that would love to team up with newbies to help them out.

C-ya!
Steve
